statements: DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE id = 1 AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse' OR last_update < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Supplies WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier ABC';
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE id = 1 AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM Supplies WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier A' AND quantity < 5 AND order_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE employee_position = 'Manager' AND location_id = 2;
DELETE FROM Orders WHERE location_id = (SELECT location_id FROM Locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY');
